## utils.isDwnServiceEndpoint() function

Type guard function to check if the given endpoint is a DwnServiceEndpoint.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isDwnServiceEndpoint(endpoint: string | DidServiceEndpoint | DidServiceEndpoint[]): endpoint is DwnServiceEndpoint;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  endpoint | string \| [DidServiceEndpoint](./dids.didserviceendpoint.md) \| [DidServiceEndpoint](./dids.didserviceendpoint.md)<!-- -->\[\] |  |

**Returns:**

endpoint is [DwnServiceEndpoint](./dids.dwnserviceendpoint.md)

True if the endpoint is a DwnServiceEndpoint, false otherwise.
